TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit VirtualMachineExtensionOperationsExtensions extends System.Object

Docs.summary: The Service Management API provides programmatic access to much of the functionality available through the Management Portal. The Service Management API is a REST API. All API operations are performed over SSL, and are mutually authenticated using X.509 v3 certificates. (see http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windowsazure/ee460799.aspx for more information)

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Management.Compute.Models.VirtualMachineExtensionListResponse List(class Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Management.Compute.IVirtualMachineExtensionOperations operations) cil managed

Docs.summary: The List Resource Extensions operation lists the resource extensions that are available to add to a Virtual Machine. In Azure, a process can run as a resource extension of a Virtual Machine. For example, Remote Desktop Access or the Azure Diagnostics Agent can run as resource extensions to the Virtual Machine. (see http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windowsazure/dn495441.aspx for more information)
Docs.returns: The List Resource Extensions operation response.
